channel.title: CVE Feed for Bosch -- Video Recording Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bosch -- Video Recording Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-32230|2023-12-18T12:58:08.690Z -- bosch -- video%20recording%20manager
item.description: An improper handling of a malformed API request to an API server in Bosch BT software products can allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) situation.
